reporter_caption.center: SOLONICK v. ELECTRIC BOAT CORPORATION, 290 Conn. 916 (2009)

caption.center: WILLIAM R. SOLONICK v. ELECTRIC BOAT CORPORATION

opinion.opinion_text:
The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 111 Conn. App. 793 (AC 29575), is denied.Page 917 Stephen D. Button, in support of the petition.
Robert S. Bystrowski and Cristin E. Sheehan, in opposition.
